lines.text: I am Doctor Crow. You are surprised?
Yes, I am! I expected you to be a man... or a woman.
lines.character: Daphne Honeybutt aka Agent Brown Cow

lines.text: Oh, Vienna! Lovely! I've always wanted to see Vienna before I die.
With a bit of luck, you'll do both.
[Daphne Honeybutt and Charlie Bind arrive at the villains' secret lair]

lines.character: Daphne Honeybutt aka Agent Brown Cow

lines.text: [Charlie Bind ogles a female technician who is bent over some equipment]
[Harold Crump approaches Carstairs, in disguise as the filter tip bootlace salesman]
I cannot smoke those, they make me deaf!
[Simpkins demonstrates how to draw his gun from a holster inside his jacket]
All ready to get off a slick draw like that.
Oh, Mr. Simpkins, that was wonderful. I'm sure I'll never get *my* drawers off as slickly as that.
lines.character: Daphne Honeybutt aka Agent Brown Cow
